identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King. Zoom in. Negative Space. Contrast.

grid.dashboard: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 xl:grid-cols-4 gap-6

containers.card: rounded-xl border border-border bg-card text-card-foreground shadow-sm hover:border-accent/50 transition-colors duration-300

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all
buttons.destructive: bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground hover:bg-destructive/90 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all
buttons.icon: h-10 w-10 p-0 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center hover:bg-accent/10

inputs.default: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

badges.base: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2

cards.account: relative overflow-hidden rounded-xl border bg-card text-card-foreground shadow transition-all hover:shadow-md

assets.icons: Use Lucide React icons. Import from 'lucide-react'. Examples: QrCode, RefreshCw, Trash2, Plus, ExternalLink, Smartphone, AlertCircle, CheckCircle2.
assets.images: No stock photos. Use placeholders for snapshots if data is missing: bg-muted/20 flex items-center justify-center text-muted-foreground.

general: Dark mode first. Light mode optional but secondary.
No gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Every interaction needs micro-animations (hover, focus, active).
Do not use 'transition: all'. Specify properties.
Do not center align the app container.
Use named exports for components, default exports for pages.
accessibility: Ensure contrast ratios meet APCA standards.
Interactive elements must have visible focus states.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the dashboard using the provided guidelines. Focus on the 'Account Card' component as the core unit. Ensure the 'Add Account' flow is smooth (modal). The 'Snapshot Viewer' should be a modal with a dark backdrop. Use the 'Manrope' font for headings (import from Google Fonts or similar if not available, otherwise fallback to system sans-serif but styled boldly). STRICTLY follow the color palette. Do not invent new colors.
